Baxter.line: Ah, yes, the infamous questionnaire. If you were wondering it, no, I wasn't the one who created it - I put up Flettner to do it.

Elliot.line: If I may ask, sir, why did you create such a test in the first place?

Baxter.line: Aside from filtering out the tens or even hundreds of journalists trying to enter the airship? Well, one could say it was a combination of a publicity stunt and a declaration of our target market.
By announcing the questionnaire, we made sure that everyone who would be interested in our invention actually heard about it.

Elliot.line: But only three people passed the test?

Baxter.line: Maybourne, Renard and Bhattacharya, you mean? No, they were not the only ones. More guests are expected further down in the voyage.
